descriptionItems: Involves designing, implementing, and testing whole new features for connectors.
Tasks require working closely with the team to ensure features align with customer's needs and place's goals.
Works with customers to review connectors' behavior, identify and fix bugs.
Requires excellent communication and collaboration skills to incorporate customer feedback for improving functionality and usability of connectors.
skills: Ability to work collaboratively with a team
Attention to detail for bug identification and fixing

descriptionItems: Involved in designing, implementing, and testing features for connectors.
Collaborated closely with the team to ensure features meet customer needs and align with place goals.
Worked with customers to review connectors' behavior, identify and fix bugs.
Developed communication and collaboration skills to incorporate feedback for improving functionality and usability of connectors.
skills: Developing collaboration skills within a team
Attention to detail for bug identification and fixing

descriptionItems: The focus of the role was on maintaining multiple Mulesoft's connectors.
Performed tasks such as resolving bugs and vulnerabilities, implementing new features, and developing new connectors.
Worked on developing connectors for various software platforms, including MongoDB, NetSuite, and others.
skills: Proficient in resolving bugs and vulnerabilities
Familiarity with MongoDB, NetSuite, and other software platforms

descriptionItems: Successfully migrated tests of 50+ Mulesoft connectors from Java (JUnit) to MTF, Mulesoft's own testing framework.
Collaborated with other Mulesoft teams to provide consultation and assistance in developing new tests for future connectors.
Ensured the testing frameworks for these connectors were robust enough to detect issues before they appeared in production environments.
skills: Good experience with Java and JUnit
Familiarity with SAP, Salesforce, Oracle EBS connectors
